FuncDef: The reset flow-car statistics command clears flow CAR statistics about specific-direction traffic in a specific slot based on the source or destination IP address.
CLIs: reset flow-car statistics { source-ip | destination-ip } [ <ip-address> ] slot <slot-id> { inbound | outbound }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a source or destination IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the slot ID of an interface board.
-

Clears flow CAR statistics about upstream direction.
-

Clears flow CAR statistics about downstream direction.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset flow-car statistics source-ip 10.1.1.1 slot 1 inbound
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To clear flow CAR statistics about specific-direction traffic in a specific slot based on the source or destination IP address, run the reset flow-car statistics command. If no IP address is specified in the command, all flow CAR statistics about specific-direction traffic in a specific slot are cleared.
